en: A bad excuse is worse than none.
zh: 糟糕的借口还不如没有。

en: A bird in hand is worth two in the bush.
zh: 一鸟在手胜于二鸟在林。

en: A contented mind is a perpetual feast.
zh: 知足常乐。

en: A good medicine tastes bitter.
zh: 良药苦口利于病，忠言逆耳利于行。

en: Better be the head of a dog than the tail of a lion.
zh: 宁为鸡首，勿为牛后。

en: Do nothing you would wish to conceal.
zh: 若要人不知，除非己莫为。

en: Experience is the best teacher.
zh: 经验是良师。

en: Many a little makes a mackle.
zh: 积少成多。

en: It is easier to get than to keep it.
zh: 创业容易守成难。

en: Look before you leap.
zh: 三思而后行。

en: It's Okay to not be Okay.
zh: 不太好也没关系。

en: Practice makes perfect.
zh: 熟能生巧。

en: Prevention is better than cure.
zh: 预防胜于治疗。

en: Rome was not built in a day.
zh: 罗马不是一天造成的。

en: You can't please everyone.
zh: 你不可能取悦所有人。

en: A laugh can be a very powerful thing.
zh: 笑容是个有力量的东西。

en: Beauty is found within.
zh: 美，是由内而外散发出的。

en: All it takes is faith and trust.
zh: 信念与信任，缺一不可。

en: If you don't try, you'll never know.
zh: 如果不尝试，你永远不会知道结果。

en: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
zh: 没有计划的目标，就只是个愿望罢了。

en: God helps those who help themselves.
zh: 天助自助者。

en: Don't judge someone's past, when you haven't walked their journey!
zh: 如果你没有经历过别人所经历的事情，就不要去评判一个人的过去！

en: Fading is true while flowering is past.
zh: 凋谢是真实的，盛开只是一种过去。

en: Great hopes make great men.
zh: 伟大的理想造就伟大的人。

en: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude. Don't complain.
zh: 如果你不喜欢某件事，就改变它；如果你不能改变它，就改变你的态度。不要抱怨。

en: If you want something you've never had, then you've got to do something you've never done.
zh: 如果你想拥有你从未有过的东西，那么你必须去做你从未做过的事情。

en: Do what you say, say what you do.
zh: 做你说过的，说你能做的。

en: Adversity does teach who your real friends are.
zh: 经历逆境会让你知道谁是真正的朋友。

en: From small beginnings come great things.
zh: 伟大始于渺小。

en: If you can't live longer, live deeper.
zh: 如果你不能活得长久，那就活得更有深度。

en: Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful.
zh: 精彩的人生不必苛求完美。

en: Live beautifully, dream passionately, love completely.
zh: 活要活得美好，梦要梦得热烈，爱要爱得完整。

en: Life is too short for us to wake up in the morning with regrets.
zh: 人生苦短，所以每天不要带着遗憾醒来。

en: Doing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness.
zh: 自由是做你喜欢做的事，幸福是喜欢你做的事。

en: Don't wait to be lonely to recognize the value of a friend.
zh: 不要等到孤独了，才明白朋友的价值。

en: There is a difference between knowing the path and walking the path.
zh: 知道和做到是两件事。

en: Be nice to people on the way up, because you'll need them on the way down.
zh: 向上爬时，对遇到的人好点，因为掉下来时，你还会遇到他们。

en: Life is 10 percent what happens to me and 90 percent how I react to it.
zh: 看待事情的态度几乎决定了你将过怎么样的人生。

en: Better late than never.
zh: 迟做总比不做好。

en: Bare words, no bargain.
zh: 空言不能成交易。

en: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
zh: 我爱你，不是因为你是怎样的一个人，而是因为我喜欢与你在一起时的感觉。

en: You complete me.
zh: 你使我人生完整。

en: You are the best thing I never planned.
zh: 你是出乎我意料的最美好之事。

en: There are two reasons why I wake up in the morning: my alarm clock and you.
zh: 我早上愿意醒来有两个理由：闹钟和你。

en: I thought love that comes in time is the best love, but it is not a patch on your love at first sight.
zh: 我以为日久生情是最美好的爱情，可却抵不过你的一见钟情。

en: Sorry, I got lost in your eyes again.
zh: 不好意思，我又再次迷失在你的眼里。

en: To the world you may be just one person. To the person you may be the world.
zh: 对这个世界来说，你也许只是某个人；但对某个人来说，你却是全世界。

en: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
zh: 因为你，我懂得了爱。

en: I'll think of you every step of the way.
zh: 我会想你，在漫漫长路的每一步。

en: Passionate love is a quenchless thirst.
zh: 热烈的爱情是不可抑制的渴望。

en: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
zh: 每一个沐浴在爱河中的人都是诗人。

en: Love is a vine that grows into our hearts.
zh: 爱是长在我们心里的藤蔓。

en: It is impossible to love and to be wise.
zh: 要爱又兼有理性是不可能的。

en: Faults are sick when love is thin.
zh: 一朝情意淡，样样不顺眼。

en: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
zh: 生命如花，爱情是蜜。

en: The road to a lover's house is never long.
zh: 通往爱人家里的路总不会漫长。

en: Love is hard to get into, but harder to get out of.
zh: 爱很难投入，但一旦投入，便更难走出。

en: Love is not only a sentiment but also an art.
zh: 爱情不仅仅是感情，它也是艺术。

en: Every man is a poet when he is in love.
zh: 每个恋爱中的人都是诗人。

en: Love is like the moon; when it does not increase, it decreases.
zh: 爱情就像月亮，不增则减。

en: Love and a cough cannot be hidden.
zh: 爱情跟咳嗽一样是掩饰不了的。

en: Love me little and love me long.
zh: 不求情意绵绵，但求天长地久。

en: Being with you is like walking on a very clear morning.
zh: 和你在一起就像在一个清爽的早晨漫步。

en: It is never too late to fall in love.
zh: 爱永远不会嫌晚。

en: There is no hiding from a lover's eyes.
zh: 什么也瞒不过恋人的眼睛。

en: In love, folly is always sweet.
zh: 恋爱中，做出傻事总是让人感到十分美妙。

en: In the very smallest cot there is room enough for a loving pair.
zh: 哪怕是最小的茅屋，对情人来说都有足够的空间。

en: Don't try so hard; the best things come when you least expect them.
zh: 不要着急，最好的总会在最不经意的时候出现。

en: You are everything when you are with me, and everything is you when you are not.
zh: 跟你在一起时，你是一切，你不在时，一切是你！

en: Love is not a matter of counting the days. It's making the days count.
zh: 爱情不是数着日子过去，它让每个日子都变得有意义。

en: I love you, so I don't wanna go to sleep, for reality is better than a dream.
zh: 爱你，所以不想入睡，因为真实比梦境还要美丽。

en: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
zh: 治疗爱的创伤，唯有加倍地去爱。

en: No words are necessary between two loving hearts.
zh: 两颗相爱的心之间不需要言语。

en: The darkness is no darkness with you.
zh: 有了你，黑暗不再是黑暗。

en: She who has never loved has never lived.
zh: 人活着总要爱一回。

en: Every day without you is like a book without pages.
zh: 没有你的日子就像一本没有书页的书。

en: While I think of you, all losses are restored, and sorrows end.
zh: 只要我一想起你，所有的失落和遗憾烟消云散。

en: Before meeting you, I indulged in the past. After meeting you, I plan to spend the rest of my life with you.
zh: 遇见你之前，我沉迷过往；遇见你以后，我盘算余生。

en: I hope my love for you will turn into bright sunlight that warms your heart.
zh: 我想将对你的感情化作暖暖的阳光，期待那洒落的光明能温暖你的心房。

en: I miss you so much already and I haven't even left yet!
zh: 尽管还不曾离开，我已对你朝思暮想！

en: Tell me you are mine. I'll be yours through all the years, till the end of time.
zh: 请告诉我你是我的。岁岁年年，我都属于你，永远永远。

en: I need you like I need the air to breathe.
zh: 我需要你，正如我需要呼吸空气。

en: The best love is probably that I make your heart move and you make me feel at ease.
zh: 最好的爱情大概是：我让你心动，你让我心安。

en: You protect the world; I protect you.
zh: 你保护世界，我保护你。

en: I am fortunate to meet you in such a big world.
zh: 世界很大，难得的是遇到了你。

en: Every single person has at least one secret that would break your heart.
zh: 每个单身的人背后，至少藏着一个让人心碎的秘密。

en: It's a good thing to like someone.
zh: 喜欢上某人，是一件美好事情。

en: I will be better, because of you, but not for you.
zh: 我会变得更好，是因为你，但不是为了你。

en: We're best mates. He makes me laugh every day.
zh: 我们是最棒的伴侣，他每天都可以让我笑。

en: I see no reason to wait. When you know it's right, it's right.
zh: 我没有看到任何需要等待的理由，当你觉得时间对了，那就是对的。

en: Someone who wants to be with you will be with you.
zh: 真心想跟你在一起支持你的人，就永远会陪着你！

en: Every time I see you, I fall in love all over again.
zh: 每见到你一次，我就又爱上你一次。

en: Affection is when you see someone's strength; love is when you accept someone's flaws.
zh: 喜欢，是看到一个人的优点；爱，是接受一个人的缺点。

en: If you want to be loved, love and be lovable.
zh: 想被人爱，就要去爱别人，并让自己可爱。

en: Our relationship is meant to be.
zh: 我们的关系是命中注定。

en: All love is secret, all soulful only for you.
zh: 所有深爱都是秘密，所有深情都只为你。

en: Some people can't tell how good he is, but no one can replace him.
zh: 有些人说不清哪里好，但就是谁也替代不了。

en: Hold your hand and don't let it go.
zh: 抓住了手就别放，爱对了人就走下去。

en: Always have, always will.
zh: 一直爱你，始终如一。

en: I love you for all that you are, all that you have been, and all you're yet to be.
zh: 我爱你的全部，包含当下、曾经以及未来的你。

en: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
zh: 今天要做一些未来的你会感谢自己的事。

en: Sweat is the lubricant of success.
zh: 汗水是成功的润滑剂。

en: Every noble work is at first impossible.
zh: 每一个伟大的工程最初看起来都是不可能做到的！

en: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
zh: 每个困境中都充满着机会。

en: The best revenge is massive success.
zh: 最佳的报复是巨大的成功。

en: Opportunities don't happen; you create them.
zh: 机会不会自己出现，你要创造它们。

en: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
zh: 人生没有极限，除了你自己设下的限制以外。

en: No cross, no crown.
zh: 不经历风雨，怎么遇见彩虹。

en: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
zh: 未来是属于那些相信自己美好梦想的人。

en: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
zh: 别让你不擅长的事阻碍了你擅长的事。

en: Great minds have purpose; others have wishes.
zh: 杰出的人有着目标，其他人只有愿望。

en: In the dull and boring world, there is also occasional luck.
zh: 枯燥无味的世界，总会有小确幸。

en: Treat yourself well.
zh: 善待你自己。

en: No fear of words, no fear of years.
zh: 不惧人言，不畏岁月。

en: Don't let the past steal your present.
zh: 只要开始，虽晚不迟。

en: Better late than never.
zh: 别让过去悄悄偷走了你的当下。

en: Stars can't shine without darkness.
zh: 如果没有黑暗，星星如何闪耀。

en: Be cheerful and hopeful.
zh: 乐观向上，充满希望。

en: Have the ability to love oneself; have the strength to love others.
zh: 有能力爱自己，有余力爱别人。

en: All things in their being are good for something.
zh: 天生我才必有用。

en: Spend your life in your own way.
zh: 用自己喜欢的方式过一生。

en: Life is short and you deserve to be happy.
zh: 生命苦短，你应该过的开心点。

en: Time does not age, and neither does our tie.
zh: 时光不老，我们不散。

en: You can't be perfect, but you can be unique.
zh: 你不能十全十美，但你能独一无二。

en: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
zh: 成功是由很多每天不断重复的小努力组成的。

en: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
zh: 所有的成长都是发生在舒适圈之外。

en: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
zh: 相信你可以，你就已经成功一半了。

en: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
zh: 赢家永远不会放弃，放弃者永远不会赢。

en: You don't have time to be timid.
zh: 人生没有时间胆怯。

en: It's up to you how far you'll go.
zh: 能走多远取决于你自己。

en: To laugh at yourself is to love yourself.
zh: 学会自嘲也是爱自己的一种表现。

en: Make each day your masterpiece.
zh: 让每一天成为你的杰作。

en: Travel far enough, and you will meet yourself.
zh: 走得足够远，你就会遇上自己。

en: Above all, don't lie to yourself.
zh: 最重要的是不要欺骗自己。

en: Light tomorrow with today.
zh: 用现在点亮未来。

en: Don't compare your life with others. There's no comparison between the sun and the moon. They shine when it's their time.
zh: 别拿你的人生和别人的比较。太阳和月亮没有可比性。它们都在属于自己的时刻发光。

en: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday and love today.
zh: 我不害怕明天，因为我经历过昨天，也热爱今天。

en: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
zh: 如果你真的很想做一件事，你就会找到方法；如果你不是很想，你就会找到借口。

en: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
zh: 世界上对勇气的最大考验，是忍受失败而不丧失信心。

en: A man's best friends are his ten fingers.
zh: 人最好的朋友是自己的10只手指。

en: Only they who fulfill their duties in everyday matters will fulfill them on great occasions.
zh: 只有在日常生活中尽责的人才会在重大时刻尽责。

en: The shortest way to do many things is to do only one thing at a time.
zh: 做许多事情的捷径就是一次只做一件事。

en: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm.
zh: 成功是，你即使跨过一个又一个失败，但也没有失去热情。

en: There's only one corner of the universe you can be sure of improving, and that's your own self.
zh: 这个宇宙中只有一个角落你肯定可以改进，那就是你自己。

en: Difficult circumstances serve as a textbook of life for people.
zh: 困难坎坷是人们的生活教科书。

en: The world is like a mirror: Frown at it and it frowns at you; smile, and it smiles too.
zh: 世界犹如一面镜子：朝它皱眉它就朝你皱眉，朝它微笑它也朝你微笑。

en: Failure is the mother of success.
zh: 失败乃成功之母。

en: The reason why a great man is great is that he resolves to be a great man.
zh: 伟人之所以伟大，是因为他立志要成为伟大的人。

en: Journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
zh: 千里之行，始于足下。

en: The first step is as good as half over.
zh: 第一步是最关键的一步。

en: Genius is an infinite capacity for taking pains.
zh: 所谓的天才是不断地承受痛楚。

en: Character is how you treat those who can do nothing for you.
zh: 品格取决于：你如何对待那些没有能力回报你的人。

en: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
zh: 能量和坚持可以克服一切。

en: The good seaman is known in bad weather.
zh: 惊涛骇浪，方显英雄本色。

en: Quitters never win and winners never quit.
zh: 退缩者永无胜利，胜利者永不退缩

en: Understand yourself in order to better understand others.
zh: 知己方能解人。

en: Better to light one candle than to curse the darkness.
zh: 与其诅咒黑暗，不如燃起蜡烛。

en: Victory won't come to me unless I go to it.
zh: 胜利是不会向我们走来的，我必须自己走向胜利。

en: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
zh: 行动不一定会带来幸福，但没有行动就没有幸福。

en: Don't worry about the vague future; just strive for the clear present.
zh: 不为模糊不清的未来担忧，只为清清楚楚的现在努力。

en: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
zh: 对明天做好的准备就是今天做到最好！

en: Knowledge can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
zh: 知识改变命运，英文成就未来。

en: Never underestimate your power to change yourself!
zh: 永远不要低估你改变自我的能力！

en: All things come to those who wait.
zh: 皇天不负苦心人。

en: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
zh: 宁愿做事不完美，总比完美地不做事要好。

en: It's not whether you get knocked down. It's whether you get up again.
zh: 你是否被打败不是重点，重点是你是否能重振旗鼓。

en: While there is life there is hope.
zh: 一息若存，希望不灭。

en: Being yourself is an honor, because nobody else can be you.
zh: 做自己是一种荣耀，因为没有人能成为你。

en: I can make it through the rain. I can stand up once again on my own.
zh: 我可以穿越风雨，也可以东山再起。

en: There are so many beautiful reasons to be happy.
zh: 有太多太多美好的理由让你笑对生活。

en: Whether you fail or fly, at least you tried.
zh: 不管是一飞冲天还是跌入谷底，至少，你尝试过。

en: Time waits for no one. Treasure every moment you have.
zh: 时间不等人，珍惜你所拥有的每分每秒。

en: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
zh: 对自己完全诚实是很好的练习。

en: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
zh: 悲观导致软弱，乐观导致力量。

en: You make a life out of what you have, not what you're missing.
zh: 靠自己所拥有的，而不是所缺少的，来过你的人生。

en: Don't let the sadness of your past and the fear of your future ruin the happiness of your present.
zh: 别让过去的悲催，或者未来的忧虑，毁掉当下的快乐。

en: Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence.
zh: 思路清楚需要的是勇气而不是智力。

en: Inside of every problem lies an opportunity.
zh: 每个问题里都藏着一个机会。

en: If you look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
zh: 如果你仔细观察，大部分的一夕成功都花了很长一段时间。

en: You must expect great things out of yourself before you can do them.
zh: 你必须先见到很棒的自己，才能做出很棒的事。

en: You are never wrong to do the right thing.
zh: 坚持做对的事，永远不会错。
author: The Intern

en: Whatever happens tomorrow, we had today.
zh: 无论明天发生什么，我们都有当下。
author: One Day

en: Life was like a box of chocolates; you never know what you're going to get.
zh: 生命就像一盒巧克力，结果往往出人意料。
author: Forrest Gump

en: Yes, the past can hurt. But I think you can either run from it or learn from it.
zh: 对，过去是痛楚的，但我认为你要么可以逃避，要么可以向它学习。
author: Lion King

en: Our job is improving the quality of life, not just delaying death.
zh: 我们要做的是提升生活品质，而不是延缓死亡。
author: Patch Adams

en: Life's a little bit messy. We all make mistakes. No matter what type of animal you are, change starts with you.
zh: 生活总会有那么点不顺心，我们都会犯错。天性如何并不重要，改变都由你开始。
author: Zootopia

en: Venture outside your comfort zone. The rewards are worth it.
zh: 勇敢地踏出舒适圈去冒险吧！那些回报，绝对值得。
author: Tangled

en: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, it is our choices.
zh: 决定我们成为什么样的人的，不是我们的能力，而是我们的选择。
author: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

en: To see the world, things dangerous to come to, to see behind walls, to draw closer, to find each other and to feel. That is the purpose of life.
zh: 开拓视野，突破万难，看见世界，贴近彼此，感受生活，这就是生活的目的。
author: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

en: The journey is what brings us happiness, not the destination.
zh: 通往目标的过程带给你快乐，最后结果并不重要。
author: Peaceful Warrior

en: We're all traveling through time together, every day of our lives. All we can do is do our best to relish this remarkable ride.
zh: 我们生活的每一天，都在穿越时空，我们能做的就是尽其所能，珍惜这趟不凡的人生旅程。
author: About Time

en: The very things that hold you down are going to lift you up.
zh: 让你跌到谷底的事情，往往也是你重新站起的原因。
author: Dumbo

en: The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
zh: 在逆境中绽放的花朵，是最珍贵也是最美的。
author: Mulan

en: I never look back, darling. It distracts from the now.
zh: 亲爱的，我从不看过去，那会让我无法专注于现在。
author: The Incredibles

en: Who says my dreams have to stay dreams?
zh: 谁说梦想只能是梦想呢？
author: The Little Mermaid

en: Experience never goes out of fashion.
zh: 经验永远不会过时。
author: The Intern

en: A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow.
zh: 今天的好计划胜过明天的完美计划。
author: Wag the Dog

en: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift, that is why it's called present!
zh: 昨天已成为历史，明天是未知的，而今天是上天赐予我们的礼物，这就是为什么我们把它叫做现在！
author: Kung Fu Panda

en: Some mistakes just have greater consequences than others. But you don't have to let the result of one mistake be the thing that defines you.
zh: 有些错误代价特别大，但你不该让一个过错定义了自己。
author: Me Before You

en: Sometimes you gotta get through your fear to see the beauty on the other side.
zh: 有时你必须先克服恐惧才能看到另一端的美丽。
author: The Good Dinosaur

en: There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
zh: 没有努力，就不会有身体或智能上的成长，而努力意谓干活。
author: Calvin Coolidge

en: Talent without working hard is nothing.
zh: 没有努力，天份不代表什么。
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

en: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
zh: 力量与成长只会来自持继的努力与奋斗。
author: Napoleon Hill

en: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
zh: 不管生活多麼困难，总是有你可以做及取得成功的事。
author: Stephen Hawking

en: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
zh: 做不可能的事蛮有趣的。
author: Walt Disney

en: Be open to learning new lessons even if they contradict the lessons you learned yesterday.
zh: 敞开心胸学习新的东西，即使它与你昨天学到的互相抵触。
author: Ellen Degeneres

en: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
zh: 我总是做我不会的事，好让我学习怎么做。
author: Pablo Picasso

en: You must be the change you want to see in the world.
zh: 在这个世界上, 你必须成为你希望看到的改变。
author: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

en: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret of success.
zh: 人必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。
author: Charles Chaplin

en: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
zh: 逻辑会带你从 A 点到达 B 点，想象力将把你带到任何地方。
author: Albert Einstein

en: The unexamined life is not worth living.
zh: 混混噩噩的生活不值得过。
author: Socrates

en: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
zh: 告诉我知识，我会忘记；教導我知识，我只会记得；让我深入其中，我才真正学到知识且能够运用。
author: Benjamin Franklin

en: Happiness lies not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
zh: 幸福不在于拥有金钱，而在于获得成就时的喜悦，以及产生创造力的激情。
author: Franklin Roosevelt

en: I am a slow walker, but I never walk backwards.
zh: 我走得很慢，但是我从来不会后退。
author: Abraham Lincoln

en: If I looked compared to others far, that is because I stand on giant's shoulder.
zh: 如果我看得比别人远，是因为我站在巨人的肩膀上。
author: Newton

en: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
zh: 如果你只看你拥有的，你将拥有的更多；如果你只看你没有的，你将永远不满足。
author: Oprah Winfrey

en: Intelligence plus character – that is the goal of real education
zh: 智慧加上品格才是教育真正的目标。
author: Martin Luther King

en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
zh: 成功不是结局，失败也非末日，坚持努力不懈的勇气，才最重要。
author: Winston Churchill

en: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
zh: 世界上最棒和最美好的事物是看不见也摸不着的，必须要去感受。
author: Helen Keller

en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
zh: 成就的唯一途径是热爱自己的事业，如果你还没找到的话，继续寻找，不要屈就。
author: Steve Jobs

en: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
zh: 我们必须接受失望，因为它是有限的，但千万不可失去希望，因为它是无穷的。
author: Martin Luther King

en: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
zh: 当整个世界都沉默时，即使一个声音也会变得很有力量。
author: Malala

en: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.
zh: 不要为成功而努力，要为做一个有价值的人而努力。
author: Albert Einstein

en: People who say that yesterday was better than today are ultimately devaluing their own existence.
zh: 说昨天比今天好的人，其实就是在贬低自己的存在。
author: Karl Lagerfeld

en: That which doesn't kill me makes me stronger.
zh: 那些打不倒我的将使我更强大。
author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
